","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2023-10-18T00:14:21.271Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":618,"readers_count":617,"score":233.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":442646,"topic_slug":"would-this-battery-be-legal","display_username":null,"primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/uploads/default/original/3X/e/8/e86319015cccaada9d24ab4412a293e4bcb0f4cb.jpeg","internal":true,"reflection":false,"clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":6}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":11148,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/would-this-battery-be-legal/442646/4","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":6},{"id":"open_mouth","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":7,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3242286,"name":"Henry Becker","username":"Henry_B","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/henry_b/{size}/178553_2.png","created_at":"2023-10-18T00:18:34.539Z","cooked":"

Be careful buying those cheap batteries. a year or two back we bought a pair of cheap batteries (I think they were Mighty Max) and they didn’t preform nearly as well and their life span wasn’t nearly as good as other batteries we have used. We primarily use MK batteries and have had limited problems with them.

Sure, I agree. We’ve got Duracell for the coming year and in the past had great performance out of them. But pink with a cuddly teddy bear

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2023-10-18T00:19:37.859Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":5,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":579,"readers_count":578,"score":280.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":442646,"topic_slug":"would-this-battery-be-legal","display_username":null,"primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":53828,"username":"Henry_B","name":"Henry Becker","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/henry_b/{size}/178553_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":11}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":11148,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/would-this-battery-be-legal/442646/6","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":11}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":11,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3242289,"name":"Ken Pontbriant","username":"electroken","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/electroken/{size}/160387_2.png","created_at":"2023-10-18T00:23:09.917Z","cooked":"

I’ve seen that pink battery before. This should be setting off the alarm bells:

I’ve weighed many of the approved batteries, and they were all over 12 pounds. Less weight = fewer plates.
Or possibly thinner plates, which would also be undesirable.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2023-10-18T00:26:52.655Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":573,"readers_count":572,"score":189.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":442646,"topic_slug":"would-this-battery-be-legal","display_username":"Ken Pontbriant","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":17612,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC 230 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/would-this-battery-be-legal/442646/7","custom_user_title":"FRC 230 Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3242295,"name":"Nathan Shepherd","username":"NShep98","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nshep98/{size}/224800_2.png","created_at":"2023-10-18T00:38:44.036Z","cooked":"

The weight actually would make this battery illegal since the rule states nominal 11 - 14.5 lbs. You’d likely have an easy time getting away with it, but I certainly wouldn’t advise it.

Buy it and run sprints with it until it dies. Then do the same with a regular battery. The people demand answers!

Neptune Battery + Kraken Motor? It’s all coming together…

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":15,"updated_at":"2023-10-18T16:10:24.342Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":243,"readers_count":242,"score":108.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":442646,"topic_slug":"would-this-battery-be-legal","display_username":"Koen Zoskey","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55666,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/would-this-battery-be-legal/442646/12","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4},{"id":"laughing","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":7,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3242571,"name":"Ian Jensen","username":"ijensen","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ijensen/{size}/203356_2.png","created_at":"2023-10-18T19:45:48.624Z","cooked":"

The website listed on the battery there:

  • Hasn’t been updated since 2017
  • Uses mainly stock photos
  • Didn’t change/remove parts of the website after the Home and About sections… in fact, after that, it looks like they didn’t change/remove anything from the website’s theme’s template, which looks to have been modeled after a divorce lawyer’s practice…

… granted, I’ve ordered from sketchier sites than this before with success. Do with this info as you will.
